1.sentence: In the end, I couldn't sleep at all because of the loud [racket].
1.meaning2: a sports implement used for hitting balls in various sports (e.g. tennis racket)
1.precontext: After a long day at work, all I wanted was to relax. At home, I noticed my neighbour was throwing a party. I could hear them dancing and talking all night.

2.sentence: I have to say, this was probably the best [season] yet!
2.meaning1: each of the four divisions of the year (spring, summer, autumn, and winter)
2.meaning2: a set or sequence of related television programmes; a series
2.precontext: It was cold outside, so I stayed at home watching TV. I haven't kept up with my favorite TV series lately. I sat down and watched the latest episodes.
